title: Clinic Specialties List
description: Hennepin Healthcare clinics are located on the HCMC campus in Downtown Minneapolis and the surrounding suburbs.
cleaned_text: Clinics are located on the HCMC campus in Downtown Minneapolis and the surrounding suburbs. To help navigate to your clinic location, here is a full listing of clinic locations. Neighborhood Clinics Brooklyn Park Clinic & Pharmacy North Loop Clinic & Pharmacy St. Anthony Village Clinic & Pharmacy Downtown Clinics and Hospital Units Clinic & Specialty Center & Pharmacy [Allergy](https://hennepinhealthcare.org/specialty/allergy/) [Cardiology](https://www.hennepinhealthcare.org/specialty/hennepin-heart-center) [Dentistry and Orange Building HCMC Green Building Downtown Parking Ramps Handicap accessible and discounted patient parking are available at the following ramps: [HCMC Parking Ramp](https://www.google.com/maps/place/South+6th+St+%26+Park+Ave,+Minneapolis,+MN+55415/@44.9738152,-93.2640781,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x52b3329fc782e4d9:0xa139dd416c9f9e78!8m2!3d44.9738152!4d-93.2618894), 6th Street and Park Avenue [Hospital Parking Ramp](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Chicago+Ave+%26+S+8th+St,+Minneapolis,+MN+55404/@44.9713156,-93.2643529,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x52b332a0398c475d:0x37a91659b90f3ace!8m2!3d44.9713156!4d-93.2621642), 8th Street and Chicago Avenue [Clinic & Specialty Center](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Park+Ave+%26+S+8th+St,+Minneapolis,+MN+55404/@44.9718911,-93.2657134,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x52b332a1d74af39d:0x3adc40fc0deb3bd0!8m2!3d44.9718873!4d-93.2635194), Park Avenue between 8th Street and 9th Street
